netcore.NET01: IndexOutOfRangeException|Thrown by the runtime only when an array is indexed improperly.
netcore.NET02: NullReferenceException|Thrown by the runtime only when a null object is referenced.
netcore.NET03: InvalidOperationException|Thrown by methods when in an invalid state.
netcore.NET04: ArgumentNullException|Thrown by methods that do not allow an argument to be null.
netcore.NET05: ArgumentOutOfRangeException|Thrown by methods that verify that arguments are in a given range.

angular.NG0100: Expression Changed After Checked|An expression value has been changed after change detection has completed
angular.NG01003: Wrong Async Validator Return Type|Async validators must return a promise or an observable, and emit/resolve them whether the validation fails or succeeds
angular.NG0200: Circular Dependency in DI|A cyclic dependency exists when a dependency of a service directly or indirectly depends on the service itself.
angular.NG0201: No Provider Found|Try to inject a service but have not declared a corresponding provider
angular.NG0203: `inject()` must be called from an injection context|Try to use the inject() function outside of the allowed injection context.
angular.NG02200: Missing Iterable Differ|NgFor could not find an iterable differ for the value passed in
angular.NG0300: Selector Collision|Two or more components use the same element selector. Because there can only be a single component associated with an element, selectors must be unique strings to prevent ambiguity for Angular.
angular.NG0301: Export Not Found|Angular can't find a directive with {{ PLACEHOLDER }} export name.
angular.NG0302: Pipe Not Found|Angular can't find a pipe with this name.
angular.NG1001: Argument Not Literal|To make the metadata extraction in the Angular compiler faster, the decorators @NgModule, @Pipe, @Component, @Directive, and @Injectable accept only object literals as arguments.
angular.NG2003: Missing Token|There is no injection token for a constructor parameter at compile time. InjectionTokens are tokens that can be used in a Dependency Injection Provider.
angular.NG2009: Invalid Shadow DOM selector|The selector of a component using ViewEncapsulation.ShadowDom doesn't match the custom element tag name requirements.
angular.NG3003: Import Cycle Detected|A component, directive, or pipe that is referenced by this component would require the compiler to add an import that would lead to a cycle of imports
angular.NG6100: NgModule.id Set to module.id anti-pattern|Using module.id as an NgModule id is a common anti-pattern and is likely not serving a useful purpose in your code.
angular.NG6999: Invalid metadata|This error represents the import or export of an @NgModule() that doesn't have valid metadata.
angular.NG8001: Invalid Element|One or more elements cannot be resolved during compilation because the element is not defined by the HTML spec, or there is no component or directive with such element selector.
angular.NG8002: Invalid Attribute|An attribute or property cannot be resolved during compilation.This error arises when attempting to bind to a property that does not exist.
angular.NG8003: Missing Reference Target|Angular can't find a directive with {{ PLACEHOLDER }} export name. This is common with a missing import or a missing exportAs on a directive.
